CustomField.description: Billable Amount associated with the Milestone itself (not including billable amounts from child Timecards/Expenses). This is primarily intended to be used for fixed-fee Projects. Defaults to and must always be same currency as Project.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Billable Amount associated with the Milestone itself (not including billable amounts from child Timecards/Expenses). This is primarily intended to be used for fixed-fee Projects. Defaults to and must always be same currency as Project.
CustomField.label: Milestone Amount
